author: Financial Times
title: Barrick Gold buys 800,000 COVID-19 antibody test kits
description: CEO Mark Bristow says company had already started to see a drop in absenteeism due to a general improvement in hygiene undertaken to combat virus
content:
Barrick Gold has purchased more than 800,000 finger-prick antibody testing kits to screen workers and the communities living close to its mines.
Chief executive Mark Bristow said the Canada-based company had invested a lot in the tests, which can be used to … [+3187 chars]
